Text:
Sorry guys, I have an issue with this torrent; after the first mission is finished, it just won't load the next mission; I've tried a different crack, but it still won't load the next mission. I will still seed for those who will try and fix or find a fix.
Here are some cheats to speed things up.

Cheat Codes 
While playing the game, press ~ 
then type one of the following codes and press [Enter]

  Result                      Cheat Code  
Level skip             Cheat.NextMission()  
Invincibility           GodMode()  
Full health             Cheat.FullHealth()  
All weapons           Cheat.TuneWeapons()  
Full ammunition     Cheat.AddAmmo()  
Unknown               Cheat.ClearOverload()
I've downloaded 2 other versions, and they both did the same thing, maybe it's just my rig, it's a shame though, it's a simple, but neat game, hope it works for everyone else.
